Name: Australia
Federal details: 6 states, 3 federal territories (of which 2 are self-governing) and 7 external territories

Name: Bosnia and Herzegovina
Federal details: 2 entities, one of which is sub-divided into 10 cantons

Name: India
Federal details: 29 states, 7 Union Territories, including a National Capital Territory

Name: Mexico
Federal details: 32 federal entities, which are 31 states and its capital Mexico City

Name: Pakistan
Federal details: 4 provinces, 4 federal territories including a federal capital territory

Name: Russia
Federal details: 46 oblasts, 22 republics, 9 krais, 4 autonomous okrugs, 3 federal-level cities, 1 autonomous oblast
